marketplace-screenshot-before-light.png.alt_text: VS Code interface showing a TypeScript file named utils.ts in the explorer panel with a right-click context menu open, highlighting the 'Migrate to Separation of Concerns' option. The editor shows mixed export functions in a single file.
marketplace-screenshot-before-light.png.description: Screenshot demonstrating how to trigger the extension by right-clicking on a TypeScript file in VS Code's Explorer panel

marketplace-screenshot-after-light.png.alt_text: VS Code interface showing the results after migration - a new utils folder containing separate TypeScript files: fetch-user-data.ts, validate-email.ts, user-manager.ts, types.ts, and index.ts. A success notification displays 'Migration completed successfully!'
marketplace-screenshot-after-light.png.description: Screenshot showing the organized file structure created by the extension after migration

marketplace-screenshot-before-dark.png.alt_text: VS Code dark theme interface showing a TypeScript file named utils.ts with a right-click context menu open, highlighting the 'Migrate to Separation of Concerns' option. The editor displays mixed export functions in a single file.
marketplace-screenshot-before-dark.png.description: Dark theme version of the before migration screenshot

marketplace-screenshot-after-dark.png.alt_text: VS Code dark theme interface showing the migration results - a new utils folder with organized TypeScript files and a success notification displaying 'Migration completed successfully!'
marketplace-screenshot-after-dark.png.description: Dark theme version of the after migration screenshot

feature-banner-one-click.png.alt_text: Feature banner showing 'Instant Code Organization' with before and after comparison. Left side shows a single utils.ts file with mixed exports, right side shows organized separate files in a utils folder. A right-click mouse cursor indicates the one-click activation.
feature-banner-one-click.png.description: Marketing banner highlighting the one-click migration feature

github-hero-header.png.alt_text: GitHub repository header with blue gradient background displaying 'Separation of Concerns Migrator for VS Code' with subtitle 'One-click code organization for TypeScript projects' and a 'Get Extension' call-to-action button.
github-hero-header.png.description: Repository hero image for GitHub README

social-twitter-card-launch.png.alt_text: Twitter/X social media card with blue gradient background announcing 'ðŸš€ New VS Code Extension - Separation of Concerns Migrator' with subtitle 'One-click code organization for TypeScript' and relevant hashtags.
social-twitter-card-launch.png.description: Social media card for Twitter/X platform announcing the extension

social-linkedin-professional.png.alt_text: LinkedIn social media card with professional blue gradient background titled 'Revolutionizing Code Organization' with subtitle describing a new VS Code extension for instant separation of concerns.
social-linkedin-professional.png.description: Professional social media card for LinkedIn platform

social-devto-header-tutorial.png.alt_text: Dev.to article header with blue gradient background titled 'Automate Separation of Concerns' with subtitle 'Complete tutorial for the new VS Code extension' and description 'Step-by-step guide to organizing TypeScript code'.
social-devto-header-tutorial.png.description: Header image for Dev.to tutorial articles

docs-export-patterns-cheatsheet.png.alt_text: Documentation infographic showing 4 supported export patterns: 1) Named Function Exports with example code 'export function fetchUserData', 2) Arrow Function Exports with example 'export const validateEmail', 3) Class Exports with 'export class UserManager', and 4) Type/Interface Exports with 'export type TUser'. Each pattern shows the resulting migrated filename.
docs-export-patterns-cheatsheet.png.description: Educational infographic explaining which TypeScript export patterns are supported by the extension

file_formats.png: Optimized for web display, <150KB per file

accessibility_features: Descriptive alt text for all images

performance.optimization: All PNG files optimized with optipng
